name: Kino Neuhaus Lichtspiele
description:
... In the cinema Mayrhofen. We daily present the current top movies from Hollywood and the international film scene. Enjoy an eventful afternoon with your kids or exciting evenings with your friends. Right in the cinema building is our bowling alley, "the Kug'l" in which you can compete with friends in a duel with the ball.
The cafe-bar movie you can let the exciting film experiences happen revue with a cocktail.

We look forward to your visit
Your team from Kino Mayrhofen
